alert.note: Alert for Belknap; Merrimack (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 01 at 10:03PM EDT until April 03 at 12:31PM EDT by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in New Hampshire... Suncook River At North Chichester affecting Belknap and Merrimack Counties. For the Suncook River...including North Chichester...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT TO EARLY MONDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Suncook River at North Chichester. * WHEN...From late tonight to early Monday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 7.0 feet, Flooding occurs at several camp sites at the Lazy River Campground. At 9.0 feet, Flooding occurs at about 20 camp sites at the Lazy River Campground. Flooding also begins at the Epsom Valley Campground. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:15 PM EDT Saturday the stage was 5.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late tomorrow morning to a crest of 7.3 feet early tomorrow afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage early Monday morning. - Flood stage is 7.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/gray.
